snippet.title: James Franco Reacts To Being Subpoenaed By Johnny’s Legal Team…
snippet.description:
James Franco Reacts to Being Subpoenaed By Johnny’s Legal Team…


Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT 👇🏻

Amber Heard Furiously Reacts To Johnny Depp Calling Her Out On Live TV!
https://youtu.be/Tzysq23diqk


Related videos:

"Amber Will Lose Now" James Franco Reacts To Being Subpoenaed by Johnny's Legal Team
https://youtu.be/pTXy4DShQaE

For never was there a story of more woe than a story about Johnny Depp and Amber Heard’s never ending legal battle. And the more time it goes, the crazier things happen. There are so many celebs who are already involved in the ongoing legal drama but here we have one of the largest celebrities to be dragged into this $50 million defamation suit. Now, the litigation involves plus one A-list participant - none other than James Franco.  Johnny Depp’s legal team subpoenaed James Franco and now the future of the libel case doesn’t appear to be very positive for Amber Heard. If everything goes as planned, James Franco’s appearance could help Johnny Depp win this legal battle and come back to normal life. But why does James Franco is officially being brought into court? We will break it down for you in a second.
If you are not aware of this part of Amber Heard’s past, James Franco is one of those people who Johnny Depp had alleged Amber slept with, while she was still married to Johnny Depp. Although, it’s been a few years since Johnny first made that allegation. But now, everything is absolutely serious because this time, James Franco is officially being brought into court to answer all the needed questions. 
Let’s get into details. James Franco is subpoenaed over surveillance footage of him entering an elevator with Amber Heard just hours after she had an explosive fight with Johnny Depp. This fight allegedly left Amber Heard with multiple bruises on her face and body. However, Johnny Depp has claimed that she "painted on" the wounds to garner "positive publicity." On the footage James Franco can be seen getting close with Amber in the elevator. this recording took place just one day before Amber Heard filed for divorce from Johnny Depp. Johnny Depp’s legal team want to inquire from James Franco how Amber Heard looked at the time of this incident.
But James Franco isn't the only one that JD's lawyers want to ask questions. Because if the bruises, that Johnny Depp’s lawyers say were painted on, were present when the actress filed for a restraining order on May 27, they should have been visible to James Franco the night after the fight on May 22 or so. Johnny Depp’s legal team is also interested in speaking with Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and Space X, because he too allegedly saw Amber Heard’s face in this time period. Here is an official Adam Waldman’s (JD’s lawyer’s) statement: “We are interested in James Franco and Elon Musk as fact witnesses because we have evidence they are men who saw Amber Heard’s face in the days and nights between when she claimed Mr. Depp smashed her in the face on May 21 and when she went to court with painted on ‘bruises’ to obtain temporary restraining order on May 27”.
